column1:
Ratnapura  dated  21.09.2015  is  set  aside  and  I  direct  that  the  1st 
Suspect
Respondent be released on the following bail conditions:-

1. 
Cash Bail in a sum of Rupees One hundred thousand.

11. 
Surety Bail with two sureties of the value of Rupees Five

111. 
The sureties should be family members of the suspect (wife,
children, parents, own  brothers or sisters) .

IV. 
After the grant of bail, the  1 st  Suspect-Respondent is directed to
report to the Officer in Charge of the Murder Investigations
Unit, Criminal Investigation Department, Colombo 01  on the
last Sunday of every month between 9.00 a.m. and  12.00noon.

v. 
Passport of the suspect is to be impounded, ifhe has one and if
not, the suspect has to tender an affidavit stating that he does

VI. 
Learned Magistrate is directed to inform the Immigration and
